entry.title: jric/fs-benchmark
entry.summary:
This benchmark runs a series of file I/O operations. Benchmark is executed in node.js and python2.

fs-benchmark

This benchmark runs a series of file I/O operations. Benchmark is executed in node.js and python2.

Put some test html files into a directory, let's call it test. Make sure this directory is in your path.

Then, run benchmark.pl test.
